rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Cdm

res.rBody:
Dum transisset sabbatum Maria Magdalene et Maria Jacobi et Salome emerunt aromata ut venientes
ungerent unguerent Jesum alleluia alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Cdm

verses.vBody:
Et valde mane una sabbatorum
veniunt venerunt ad monumentum orto iam sole

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-L Hyd Cdm

verses.prosula: Haec est alma dies in qua spoliatur Avernus et surrexit homo deus exsultate redempti
